chapter.title: Constrained Optimization Methods â€” Project 4
chapter.para:
As Dr. Mohamed El-Sayed shows in , the assignment is to use the constrained optimization program developed in
to solve example 5-1 of . We are also to compare our results with those in the book's tables 5-3 through 5-5 and provide the iteration history printout of our solution.

In addition to solving example 5-1, I have solved a more general problem: that of allowing distortion energy theory to control the design of the beam rather than just a maximum axial stress theory. Let's begin.

textobject.phrase: Project 4: Use the program developed in project (3) to solve example 5-1 of the text. Compare results with tables 5-3, 5-4, 5-5. Provide iteration history print out of your optimum soln. (25 pts) Due 12th week (Monday)
